Package org.ejbca.core.ejb.crl

Class PublishingCrlSessionBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ejbca.core.ejb.crl.PublishingCrlSessionBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PublishingCrlSession, PublishingCrlSessionLocal, PublishingCrlSessionRemote
    public class PublishingCrlSessionBean
extends Object
implements PublishingCrlSessionLocal, PublishingCrlSessionRemote
    This session bean provides a bridge between EJBCA and CESecore by incorporating CRL creation (CESeCore) with publishing (EJBCA) into a single atomic action.
    Version:
    $Id: PublishingCrlSessionBean.java 34193 2020-01-07 15:18:15Z samuellb $

      • createCRLs

        public int createCRLs​(AuthenticationToken admin)
               throws AuthorizationDeniedException
        Description copied from interface: PublishingCrlSession
        Method that checks if there are any CRLs needed to be updated and then creates their CRLs. No overlap is used. This method can be called by a scheduler or a service.
        Specified by:
        createCRLs in interface PublishingCrlSession
        Parameters:
        admin - administrator performing the task
        Returns:
        crl
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - fail

      • createDeltaCRLs

        public int createDeltaCRLs​(AuthenticationToken admin)
                    throws AuthorizationDeniedException
        Description copied from interface: PublishingCrlSession
        Method that checks if there are any delta CRLs needed to be updated and then creates their delta CRLs. No overlap is used. This method can be called by a scheduler or a service.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Throws:

      • createCRLs

        public int createCRLs​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                      Collection<Integer> caids,
                      long addtocrloverlaptime)
               throws AuthorizationDeniedException
        Description copied from interface: PublishingCrlSessionLocal
        Method that checks if there are any CRLs needed to be updated and then creates their CRLs. A CRL is created: 1. if the current CRL expires within the crloverlaptime (milliseconds) 2. if a crl issue interval is defined (>0) a CRL is issued when this interval has passed, even if the current CRL is still valid This method can be called by a scheduler or a service.
        Specified by:
        createCRLs in interface PublishingCrlSessionLocal
        Parameters:
        admin - administrator performing the task
        caids - list of CA ids (Integer) that will be checked, or null in which case ALL CAs will be checked
        addtocrloverlaptime - given in milliseconds and added to the CRL overlap time, if set to how often this method is run (poll time), it can be used to issue a new CRL if the current one expires within the CRL overlap time (configured in CA) and the poll time. The used CRL overlap time will be (crloverlaptime + addtocrloverlaptime)
        Returns:
        int
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - fail

      • createDeltaCRLs

        public int createDeltaCRLs​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                           Collection<Integer> caids,
                           long crloverlaptime)
                    throws AuthorizationDeniedException
        Description copied from interface: PublishingCrlSessionLocal
        Method that checks if there are any delta CRLs needed to be updated and then creates them. This method can be called by a scheduler or a service.
        Specified by:
        createDeltaCRLs in interface PublishingCrlSessionLocal
        Parameters:
        admin - administrator performing the task
        caids - list of CA ids (Integer) that will be checked, or null in which case ALL CAs will be checked
        crloverlaptime - A new delta CRL is created if the current one expires within the crloverlaptime given in milliseconds
        Returns:
        int
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - fail

      • createCRLNewTransactionConditioned

        public boolean createCRLNewTransactionConditioned​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                                                  int caid,
                                                  long addtocrloverlaptime)
                                           throws CryptoTokenOfflineException,
                                                  CADoesntExistsException,
                                                  AuthorizationDeniedException,
                                                  CAOfflineException
        Description copied from interface: PublishingCrlSession
        Method that checks if the CRL is needed to be updated for the CA and creates the CRL, if necessary. A CRL is created: 1. if the current CRL expires within the crloverlaptime (milliseconds) 2. if a CRL issue interval is defined (>0) a CRL is issued when this interval has passed, even if the current CRL is still valid
        Specified by:
        createCRLNewTransactionConditioned in interface PublishingCrlSession
        Parameters:
        admin - administrator performing the task
        caid - the id of the CA this operation regards
        addtocrloverlaptime - given in milliseconds and added to the CRL overlap time, if set to how often this method is run (poll time), it can be used to issue a new CRL if the current one expires within the CRL overlap time (configured in CA) and the poll time. The used CRL overlap time will be (crloverlaptime + addtocrloverlaptime)
        Returns:
        true if a CRL was created
        Throws:
        CryptoTokenOfflineException - fail
        CADoesntExistsException - fail
        AuthorizationDeniedException - fail
        CAOfflineException - fail

        public boolean createDeltaCRLnewTransactionConditioned​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                                                       int caid,
                                                       long crloverlaptime)
                                                throws CryptoTokenOfflineException,
                                                       CAOfflineException,
                                                       CADoesntExistsException,
                                                       AuthorizationDeniedException
        Description copied from interface: PublishingCrlSessionLocal
        Method that checks if the delta CRL needs to be updated and then creates it.

        createDeltaCRLnewTransactionConditioned in interface PublishingCrlSessionLocal
        Parameters:
        admin - administrator performing the task
        caid - the id of the CA this operation regards
        crloverlaptime - A new delta CRL is created if the current one expires within the crloverlaptime given in milliseconds
        Returns:
        true if a Delta CRL was created
        Throws:
        CryptoTokenOfflineException - fail
        CAOfflineException - fail
        CADoesntExistsException - fail
        AuthorizationDeniedException - fail
